mapper.select: SELECT npls.*, c.chinese_name, c.card_id, cai.account_status, cai.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, cai.OVERDUE_AMOUNT, cai.OVERDUE_TIME, cai.CARD_NUMBER FROM npls_information npls LEFT JOIN basic_customer_information c ON c.id = npls.customer_id LEFT JOIN customer_account_information cai ON cai.id = npls.account_id WHERE npls.id=#{id}
select count(*) from npls_information npls inner join basic_customer_information b on npls.customer_id=b.id where b.user_id=#{id}
